department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Request for proposal for a strapping machine.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of The Department of National Defence, is issuing this request for proposal...
full_summary:
====================
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing a Request for Proposals (RFP) for the acquisition of a Strapping Machine.

**RFP Details:**

* **RFP Number**: WS4207379781-Doc4209034126
* **Amended**: This RFP has undergone two amendments.
* **Publication Date**: Published on September 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Close on October 27, 2023, at 14:00 (hours and minutes), Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 31, 2023

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence is procuring a Strapping Machine, including delivery and on-site training, to be used in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

**Contradiction Requests and Evaluation:**

* This is a Competitive RFP, open to offers from qualified bidders.
* Offers are accepted when submitted online via https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17588508?extsite=MTc1ODg1MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Contradiction Criteria**: The lowest price
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.
* **Regions**: Montreal, Quebec, Canada
* **Service Obligations**: Training is expected by the client to be provided on-site during the contract duration.

**Information on Contact and Tender Documents:**

* For more detailed information, please visit Ariba's e-Sourcing platform at the link provided above.
* All correspondence regarding the Request for Proposal shall be addressed to Renee-Ann Therien at renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**:FR**
#### Sauvegarde de proposition

  Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux expose à l’envoi un ”  RFP ” du Ministère de la Défense nationale pour l’achat d’une ” cercleuse automatique ”.

  *   **Date de publication de la notification**: émis le 29 arrêt 2023.
